name: Mike Stoneberg
description: I am a good hearted man, Simple, hard working, and honest guy really wanting to find someone special. Im very spontaneous and loving.I love kissing and long walks,I’m a romantic at heart, and really enjoy doing little things for that special someone as long as it’s appreciated and not expected. I am caring and I can make woman happy and I’m very always faithful, nice,trustful. I need to compliment my life with a good WOMAN and i Love to treat a WOMAN like a WOMAN should be treated with Respect, Honesty, I love music, warm weather.
